The Internet of Insecure Things

27 Jul 2014

So, Internet of Things is happening. More and more things are connected to the internet every day. What about securing the Internet of Things? This great presentation by @securityweekly covered most of the problems. And I laughed a lot while reading it. Too bad I can’t listen to him explaining it in details.

http://www.slideshare.net/pauldotcom/the-internet-of-insecure-things-10-most-wanted-list
